context.title: Create a 3D Area of Interest
context.description: Create an area of interest (AOI) for an existing 3D volume.

context.title: Horizon to Area of Interest
context.description: Create an area of interest (AOI) from the edge of an existing horizon.

context.title: Create a 2D Area of Interest
context.description: Create an area of interest (AOI) for an existing 2D volume.

context.title: ASCII Horizon Import
context.description: Use the ASCII Horizon Import algorithm to import raw ASCII data into GeoCraft and convert the data into horizons per your specifications.
